mean_cn: n. 不协调，不一致，不适宜
mean_en: the quality of disagreeing; being unsuitable and inappropriate
word_etyma: in不 + congru协调 + ity 表名词 →  不协调；不一致；不适宜
short_phrase: An egg in an oyster is an incongruity.
sentence: It's an incongruity to see an egg inside an oyster shell.
sentence_trans: 蚌壳里面有只鸡蛋，这场景很不协调。
